授業目的:
The main objective is to improve students' ability to discuss educational issues in English.
The secondary objective is to improve their active vocabulary.
到達目標: By the end of the course, students should be able to discuss, give their opinions on and present on the issues raised in the course.
授業方法: Class will normally begin with warmup questions about recent events and the weather. There will be ample opportunity for pair and group work.

第1回: First Semester - Discussion Questions (two rounds). I saw the Dark Underbelly of Preschool Parenting - model read.
Review. I Saw...-read and look up vocabulary.
第2回: First Semester - Discussion Questions (one round). I Saw the Dark Underbelly of Preschool Parenting - read aloud and chorus (short segments). Vocabulary Matching Exercises I, II & III.
I Saw...Vocabulary Matching Exercises I, II & III.

第4回: I Saw... - students read aloud in turns. Cloze. Comprehension Questions.
第5回: I Saw ... - students read aloud in turns. Discussion Questions. Cloze.
第6回: I Saw ... - students read aloud in turns.  Vocabulary Matching Exercise IV.
第7回: I Saw ... - students read aloud in turns. Dictation practice.
第8回: I Saw ... - students read aloud in turns.  Vocabulary Matching Exercises V.
